text: Fazlollah Reza () (January 1, 1915 - November 19, 2019) was an Iranian university professor. He was born in Rasht. He was a Fellow of the IEEE and AAAS for his works to network and information theory. He was an honorary member of the Academy of Persian Language and Literature and had written and spoken extensively on classical Persian poetry. Reza was the head of Aryamehr University of Industry (Sharif University of Technology), University of Tehran, Iran's ambassador to Canada and Iran's ambassador to UNESCO. As a professor, he taught at MIT, McGill University, and University of Tehran. ==Works== * * * * ==Other websites== * Short biography Category:1915 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Iranian academics Category:Iranian engineers Category:Gilan Province Category:Iranian centenarians Category:Ambassadors to Canada Category:Academics of McGill University
title: Fazlollah Reza
